cast.original_title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
cast.overview: When a huge alien probe enters the galaxy and begins to vaporize Earth's oceans, Kirk and his crew must travel back in time in order to bring back whales and save the planet.
cast.title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home

details.biography: Bob Sarlatte is an American actor, comedian and sports announcer known for such films and television series as Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home, EDtv and The David Letterman Show. Sarlatte was also the on-field stadium announcer for 30 years for the San Francisco 49ers football team.
details.name: Bob Sarlatte
